hints.content:
Cara started with $\goldE{42}$ blocks.

![A number line starts at 42.](web+graphie://cdn.kastatic.org/ka-perseus-graphie/c9b85cdf6fc6ea7dec183e382b71fb56ec108384)

To add on the number line, we jump to the **right**.

She added $\maroonD{12}$ red blocks.

![A number line starts at 42 with plus 12 and goes to 54. ](web+graphie://cdn.kastatic.org/ka-perseus-graphie/f15dc51d49971122f27a0e43f4646f84501c0957)

$\goldE{42} + \maroonD{12} = 54$

Then she added $\blueE{14}$ blue blocks.

![A number line starts at 42 with plus 12 and goes to 54. From 54 plus 14 goes to 68. ](web+graphie://cdn.kastatic.org/ka-perseus-graphie/c7a1d9da27f3dd9cef6bfc82e92a361e53a529e6)

$54+  \blueE{14} = 68$

Last, she added $\purpleD{16}$ purple blocks.

![A number line starts at 42 with plus 12 and goes to 54. From 54 plus 14 goes to 68. From 68 plus 16 goes to 84.](web+graphie://cdn.kastatic.org/ka-perseus-graphie/d84081345b7a5dde58902b42bbcc24ec9be37384)

$68+\purpleD{16} = 84$

This number line represents how to find Cara's total number of blocks:

![A number line starts at 42 with plus 12 and goes to 54. From 54 plus 14 goes to 68. From 68 plus 16 goes to ?.](web+graphie://cdn.kastatic.org/ka-perseus-graphie/c8eead4c70d641d91b2b486cbed861378ccb68bd)

Cara had $84$ total blocks.

question.content:
Cara had a tower with $42$ blocks.  

She added $12$ red blocks, $14$ more blue blocks, and $16$ purple blocks.    

**Which number line shows how to find how many blocks Cara's tower has total?**

[[☃ radio 1]]

**How many blocks does Cara's tower have now?**

[[☃ numeric-input 1]] blocks

choices.content: ![A number line starts at 42 with plus 12 and goes to 54. From 54 plus 14 goes to 68. From 68 plus 16 goes to ?.](web+graphie://cdn.kastatic.org/ka-perseus-graphie/a9fa104afc5c8c7ebe130b0cf5586fa0d910d6f2)

![A number line starts at 0 with plus 12 and goes to 12. From 12 plus 14 goes to 26. From 26 plus 16 goes to ?.](web+graphie://cdn.kastatic.org/ka-perseus-graphie/bebe454853d8c8efecfcf7127c196857d6fa847f)
